member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_PROCESS_SUPPORT_FLAGS
member.summary: Specifies whether a video format and colorspace conversion operation is supported.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_PROCESS_SUPPORT_FLAGS.D3D12_VIDEO_PROCESS_SUPPORT_FLAG_NONE
member.summary: The conversion from the source format and colorspace to destination format and colorspace are not supported.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_PROCESS_SUPPORT_FLAGS.D3D12_VIDEO_PROCESS_SUPPORT_FLAG_SUPPORTED
member.summary: The conversion from the source format and colorspace to destination format and colorspace are supported.
